title: Legacy / Limited Time Skins going back on sale
body:
Hey fellas,

Was just wonderin if anyone had any idea when they're gonna do that thing they do each year where they bring back all the retired and limited edition skins for a short bit.
I assumed they did it around christmas but I can't remember for the life of me.

replies.body:
The vault opens usually around or after Snowdown. 
Just keep your fingies crossed & keep your rito points in-hand. :v

See how I used quotation marks on 'legacy' and 'retired' (just like here)?
This is an indication of other meaning, usually comical.

I'm taking a poke at Riot here, not King Monday.

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PaoL8TA3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-21T18:23:37.952+0000)
>
> You missed the point.

Can you enlighten me then please?
there is no such thing as 'legacy' or 'retired' skins in LoL, they bring them back when they want more $

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PaoL8TA3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-21T10:00:08.755+0000)
>
> there is no such thing as 'legacy' or 'retired' skins in LoL, they bring them back when they want more $

Lol, sorry mate, you are wrong and King Monday is fully correct.  Limited and legacy are classes of skins.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Legacy_Vault

limited skins,  are considered the rarest, such as Black ali, human Ryze, King Rammus, silver Kayle, Judgement kale, ufo corki, PAX tf, and sivir just to name a few.
